sen.j: 平 保盛（たいら の やすもり）は、平安時代末期の武将。
sen.e: TAIRA no Yasumori was a busho (Japanese military commander) who lived in the late Heian period.

sen.e: Born as the eldest child born out of wedlock of Ike chief councilor of state TAIRA no Yorimori.

sen.e: Although he fought the Genpei War with Mitsumori and other members, he didn't get to join the flight of the Taira clan from Kyoto.

sen.e: After the Taira clan was defeated, he was reappointed the former post and granted the rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) in 1209.
